--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Mary-Ann" <maryannsfanfic@y...> wrote:
> Hi!
> 
> I sent the following message two days ago, but as it is still not 
> showing, I decided to give it another try. Sorry if yahoo finally 
> behaves and if you receive two copies.

Only two copies?  I'm up to 12 copies of one of Tiffany's messages 
earlier today, about 8 of MissB's reply, and about the same number of 
Tiffany's reply to that.  :-D

Anyway, Yahoo is still working on the message delivery problem with 
Groups.  Uh... I received 2 copies of their message to me.  (giggle) 
Any of you continuing to have problems receiving list mail into your 
inboxes (very late, multiple copies, not at all), would you contact 
me off-list and let me know what you're experiencing in case Yahoo 
wants more info from me to help them figure it out?  
(spiritus_saitou@...)  I'm sure to receive multiple copies of 
it, thank you.  ;-)

phil
